Welcome to Python Programming Project 2’s documentation!¶

stocks.driver.arg_parser(args)¶
Parameters

args – sys.argv list

use:

parses the list and splits them to get rid of the command line flag names

class stocks.driver.fetcher(time_limit, db)¶
fetch_all_data(args)¶
use:

calls the update_stock method for each ticker in self.tickers. should run for a specific time period

update_stock(ticker, c)¶
Parameters

  • ticker – the ticker to update

  • c – cursor to execute sql commands

use:

request info of the ticker and update the database with the info
